title: Ellipsoid
description: A closed quadric surface that is a three dimensional analogue of an ellipse.

show.description: Whether or not the ellipsoid is shown.

fill.description: Whether or not the ellipsoid is filled.

material.description: The material to display on the surface of the ellipsoid.

outline.description: Whether or not the ellipsoid is outlined.

outlineColor.description: The color of the ellipsoid outline.

outlineWidth.description: The width of the ellipsoid outline.

stackPartitions.description: The number of times to partition the ellipsoid into stacks.

slicePartitions.description: The number of times to partition the ellipsoid into radial slices.

subdivisions.description: The number of samples per outline ring, determining the granularity of the curvature.

shadows.description: Whether or not the ellipsoid casts or receives shadows.

distanceDisplayCondition.description: The display condition specifying at what distance from the camera this ellipsoid will be displayed.
